text: C覺n覺nda, Biz Nuhka jana andan kiyinki paygambarlarga vahiy jibergenibiz s覺yaktuu saga da vahiy jiberdik. Jana Biz Ibrahimge, Ismay覺lga, Ishakka, Yakubga jana andan taragan (paygambar) urpaktarga, Iysaga, Ayyubga, Yunuska, Harunga jana Sulaymanga vahiy jibergenbiz. Osondoy ele, Daudka Zabur (kitepterin) bergenbiz
